name: Dreadful
description: Dreadful is a survival horror game that features an altered gameplay style with third-person navigation currently in development.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits Processor: Core i3-530 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650 / ATI DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
